thread.title: Kenya: Kenya Medical Association revokes CS Mailu’s membership - The Standard
thread.title_full: Kenya: Kenya Medical Association revokes CS Mailu’s membership - The Standard

author: Patel Okumu
title: Kenya: Kenya Medical Association revokes CS Mailu’s membership - The Standard
text:
Your are here » Home » Health Kenya Medical Association revokes CS Mailu’s membership By Patel Okumu | Updated Tue, February 14th 2017 at 13:53 GMT +3 SHARE THIS ARTICLE Share on Twitter Health CS Cleopa Mailu and PS Nicholas Muraguri 
Nairobi, Kenya: Kenya Medical Association has revoked Health CS Cleopa Mailu and PS Nicholas Muragori membership for one year for ‘disgracing the organisation’. 
At the same time Health CS Cleopa Mailu accused his PS Nicholas Muraguri of insubordination, revealing that he had appointed him as the leader of the Ministry's negotiating team, only for him to appoint a secondary officer as his representative, citing his engagement in other national issues. KMPDU officials being led away to start serving their jail term. 
To protest jailing of their union officials, Mombasa doctors have vowed to paralyse activities in private hospitals for 48hrs and have demanded for their immediate release. WATCH THIS
